IMVU, Redwood City, CA.

Our front end is WebGL and reactive JavaScript with a real time push model.

Our back end is Haskell, Erlang, C++/GPU, and PHP.

We power the animated emojis of Kim Kardashian Wests Kimoji app, as well as a profitable entertainment social network.

We're the original Lean Startup, and take tests and continuous deployment seriously.

Top needs include front end ninja, Haskell back end guru, and data science statistician on top of our hive/spark/kafka infrastructure.

http://www.IMVU.com/jobs
